title: Can a blind person see again through an eye surgery?

og.title: Can a blind person see again through an eye surgery?
og.description: Answer (1 of 10): It depends on what the definition of blind is. If that means that you are so blind that it’s as if you are in a room with no lights and you cannot even see your hand in front of you then at this point in time it is unlikely that Surgery can remedy that. However if you have a sev...
